title: 148.9983 REQUIREMENTS FOR LICENSURE.
text:
An individual seeking licensure as a behavior analyst must complete and submit a written application on forms provided by the board together with the appropriate fee as specified under section 148.9995.
An applicant for licensure as a behavior analyst must submit evidence satisfactory to the board that the applicant:
(1) has a current and active national certification as a board-certified behavior analyst issued by the certifying entity; or
(2) has completed the equivalent requirements for certification by the certifying entity, including satisfactorily passing a psychometrically valid examination administered by a nationally accredited credentialing organization.
The applicant must complete a background check pursuant to section 214.075.
